FuncDef: The reset dhcp snooping white-list statistics command resets statistics about packets matching a DHCP snooping whitelist rule.
CLIs: reset dhcp snooping white-list [ rule-id <rule-id> ] [ slot <slot-id> ] statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a whitelist rule.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 1024.

Specifies the ID of a whitelist rule.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 31.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset dhcp snooping white-list rule-id 1 slot 1 statistics
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before running the display command to check statistics about packets matching a DHCP snooping whitelist rule, run the reset command to clear existing statistics.
